column4: Hey all, I'm having a problem with networking. I loose my DNS server settings every time I turn the system off, and have to re-enter them at every boot.
which is annoying.
i had the same problem. never really fisxed it.
hmmm
try entering it in your resolv.conf file
OK.
where would I find that? /etc/resolv.conf?
its unique. just search
Do you know of a script that'll do a 'Open Terminal Here'?
- http://g-scripts.sourceforge.net/
Thanks, I just installed the one you suggested, it's nice.
i should prolly mention that i have the linux drivers
alwight thanks
winecfg?
not winecfg. something with options to install/remove software, edit the reg, install basic stuff (like IE and installshield)
oh.
there;s a new one out
everyones raving about some new feature.
Do you mean the BETA? Because there was AXGL support in that
